CLaRK_document_dtd.dtd: <!ELEMENT control Documents?> <!ATTLIST control type (IF|IF_NOT|IF_CHANGED|IF_NOT_CHANGED|GOTO|IF_APPLIED|DELETE|EXIST) #REQUIRED xpath CDATA #IMPLIED target CDATA #REQUIRED label CDATA #IMPLIED > <!ELEMENT document (#PCDATA)> <!ELEMENT Documents document+> <!ELEMENT info (#PCDATA)> <!ELEMENT multiqueryex ((query|control)*,info?)> <!ATTLIST multiqueryex toolName CDATA #FIXED "MultiQueryEx" nowarn (y|n) "y" noresultbreak (y|n) "n" usegc (y|n) "n" xmlView (y|n) "n" > <!ELEMENT query (#PCDATA)> <!ATTLIST query tool (Statistics|Concordance|Extract|Sort|TextReplace|Remove|Grammar|Constraints|Rename|XSLT|MultiQuery|EntityConverter|GrammarGroup|InsertAttribute|InsertChild|InsertParent|InsertSibling|XPathTransformation|MultiQueryEx) #REQUIRED label CDATA #IMPLIED >
